title: Shashvat Patel
text:
About Me
I am a 4th year undergraduate student at the University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) majoring in Statistics and Data Science. I have a passion for Product Management and have work experience at Cisco, Panorama Education, and RippleMatch. I enjoy using data to break down complex problems and visualizing my findings through wireframes. My relevant coursework at UCLA includes: Program in Computing (C++), Linear Algebra and Applications, Statistics, Programming with R, Data-Driven Mathematical Modeling, Python and Other Technologies for Data Science.

Outside of school, I am interested in basketball, football, and hip-hop music. I also enjoy art museums and late night walks along the ocean side!

Attached here is my Resume

Please feel free to contact me through my email or through the phone number listed on my resume!
